text: @GOPLeader In case you are not aware, but unemployment is over 11%. COVID-19 cases are increasing around the country. The opening up of the country is to be slowed down. While your boss Trump ignorantly says the virus will just ‘go away’. But then you may be ignorant enough to believe that.
